front.title: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL): MTU Negotiation

abstract.t: The base IETF TRILL protocol has a TRILL campus-wide MTU feature, specified in RFC 6325 and RFC 7177, that assures that link state changes can be successfully flooded throughout the campus while being able to take advantage of a campus-wide capability to support jumbo packets. This document specifies optional updates to that MTU feature to take advantage, for appropriate link-local packets, of link-local MTUs that exceed the TRILL campus MTU. In addition, it specifies an efficient algorithm for local MTU testing.
